title: Spreadsheet Converter
description: Convert spreadsheets between popular formats while preserving data and formulas. Supports Excel (XLSX/XLS), CSV, and ODS formats.

sections.title: About Spreadsheet Conversion
content: Convert spreadsheets between popular formats while preserving data and formulas.

sections.title: Common Use Cases
content: CSV to Excel for data analysis
Excel to CSV for data import/export
Open proprietary formats in open source tools
